meanings.definition: Relating to or denoting a property of a concept or term that refers to the objects that it denotes.
meanings.sent1: The extensional meaning of the word 'cat' includes all furry animals with whiskers.
meanings.sent2: In the extensional sense, the term 'bird' encompasses creatures that have feathers and wings.
meanings.sent3: It was an extensional mix-up when he thought 'dog' referred to all animals with scales.
meanings.sent4: Her extensional understanding of 'tree' reached beyond just the tall plants to include bushes and shrubs.
meanings.sent5: The extensional definition of 'fruit' was so broad that it included not only apples and oranges but also tomatoes and cucumbers.

meanings.definition: Denoting a definition that specifies the objects to which a term applies.
meanings.sent1: The extensional approach to defining 'triangle' lists the specific shapes that fall under this category.
meanings.sent2: An extensional definition of 'vehicle' would include cars, trucks, bicycles, and even skateboards.
meanings.sent3: It became an extensional challenge to determine if 'colorful' referred to all hues or just a few.
meanings.sent4: The extensional boundaries of 'furniture' expanded to include not only chairs and tables but also bookshelves and ottomans.
meanings.sent5: Her extensional interpretation of 'dessert' encompassed not only cakes and pies but also ice cream and cookies.
